cells.data:
## Purpose

Confirming presence of insert from gibson assemblies in Bocki, Birchii, and mel.

## Samples

primers:
cm_Ams2_cnfrm_r1   cctctaggtccacgggactg
cm_Ams2_cnfrm_f1   gcgacacggaaatgttgaat

1-10: Birchii colonies 1:10
11-20: Bocki colonies 1:10
21-30: Melanogaster colonies 1:10

## Program

step	temp	time
1	95	30 sec
2	95	15 sec
3	64	1 min
4	72	2 min
5	72	1 min
6	4	hold

Cycles = 29

## Results 

![Screen Shot 2016-11-07 at 10.37.06 AM.png](quiver-image-url/FC7714BB2CAADCFAF312BC7BFA9A8A6A.png)

![Screen Shot 2016-11-07 at 10.36.40 AM.png](quiver-image-url/DC2F7F3307C7A8E1EDBF4D76C3F3742A.png)


## Conclusion

It did not work. Likely because the constructs re-circularized. I will try again and add shrimp phosphotase.
